Peercoin is an proof-of-stake cryptocurrency launched in August 2012. Like Bitcoin Peercoin stores value and can be sent over the internet without any central authority. Owning Peercoins allows for participation in the proof-of-stake consensus, making it possible to create new blocks and be rewarded for it.
